questionsSolved.userSolution: select first_name,last_name from patients where allergies isnull;
select first_name, last_name from patients where weight between 100 and 120;
select concat(first_name , ' ', last_name)as full_name from patients;
select count(*) as patient_count from patients where YEAR (birth_date) = 2010;
select first_name,last_name,height FROM patients where HEIGHT = 226;
SELECT * FROM patients where patient_id IN (1,45,534,879,1000);
select count(*) AS total_admissions from admissions;
select * from admissions where admission_date = discharge_date;
select patient_id , count(*) as total_admissions from admissions where patient_id=579 group by patient_id;
select first_name from patients where first_name like "C%";

select distinct year(birth_date) as birth_years 
from patients order by birth_years;
select distinct first_name from patients group by first_name having count (first_name)=1;

select city , count(*) as total_patients
from patients
group by city
order by total_patients desc , city asc;

select allergies , count(*) as allergies_count
from patients
where allergies is not null 
group by allergies
order by allergies_count desc;

select day(admission_date) as day_of_month , count(*) as admission_count
from admissions
group by day_of_month
order by admission_count desc;
select count(*) from admissions
select first_name,last_name ,count(

select doctor_id , concat("first_name, " ","last_name)as full_name
from doctors
group by admission_date

select count(*)as total_patients
from patients

select patient_id, first_name , last_name 
from patients
where diagnosis ="Dementia"
select count(*)
select count(*) as male_count

select first_name , last_name , allergies 
from patients
select distinct first_name, last_name
select first_name,last_name

SELECT first_name, last_name, birth_date
FROM patients
WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '1970-01-01' AND '1979-12-31'
ORDER BY birth_date ASC;

SELECT patient_id, attending_doctor_id, diagnosis
FROM admissions
WHERE
  (
    MOD(patient_id, 2) = 1
    AND attending_doctor_id IN (1, 5, 19)
  )
  OR
  (
    attending_doctor_id LIKE '%2%'
    AND LENGTH(CAST(patient_id AS TEXT)) = 3
  );

SELECT
  UPPER(patients.first_name || ' ' || patients.last_name) AS patient_full_name,
  admissions.diagnosis,
  UPPER(doctors.first_name || ' ' || doctors.last_name) AS doctor_full_name
FROM admissions
JOIN patients ON admissions.patient_id = patients.patient_id
JOIN doctors ON admissions.attending_doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id;

SELECT
  UPPER(first_name || ' ' || last_name) AS full_name,
  ROUND(height / 30.48, 1) AS height_in_feet,
  ROUND(weight * 2.205, 0) AS weight_in_pounds,
  birth_date,
  CASE
    WHEN gender = 'M' THEN 'Male'
    WHEN gender = 'F' THEN 'Female'
    ELSE 'Other'
  END AS gender_full
FROM patients;

ELECT p.patient_id, p.first_name, p.last_name
FROM patients p
LEFT JOIN admissions a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id
WHERE a.patient_id IS NULL;

SELECT
  MAX(daily_visits) AS max_visits,
  MIN(daily_visits) AS min_visits,
  ROUND(AVG(daily_visits), 2) AS average_visits
FROM (
  SELECT admission_date, COUNT(*) AS daily_visits
  FROM admissions
  GROUP BY admission_date
) AS daily_admissions;

SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN weight BETWEEN 100 AND 109 THEN '100'
    WHEN weight BETWEEN 110 AND 119 THEN '110'
    WHEN weight BETWEEN 120 AND 129 THEN '120'
    WHEN weight BETWEEN 130 AND 139 THEN '130'
    WHEN weight BETWEEN 140 AND 149 THEN '140'
    WHEN weight BETWEEN 150 AND 159 THEN '150'
    WHEN weight BETWEEN 160 AND 169 THEN '160'
    WHEN weight BETWEEN 170 AND 179 THEN '170'
    WHEN weight BETWEEN 180 AND 189 THEN '180'
    WHEN weight BETWEEN 190 AND 199 THEN '190'
    ELSE 'Other'  
  END AS weight_group,
  COUNT(*) AS total_patients
FROM patients
GROUP BY weight_group
ORDER BY weight_group DESC;

SELECT
  patient_id,
  weight,
  height,
  CASE
    WHEN (weight / (POW(height / 100, 2))) >= 30 THEN 1
    ELSE 0
  END AS isObese
FROM patients;

SELECT  p.patient_id,  p.first_name,  p.last_name,  d.specialty
FROM patients p
JOIN admissions a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id
JOIN doctors d ON a.attending_doctor_id = d.doctor_id
WHERE a.diagnosis = 'Epilepsy'
  AND d.first_name = 'Lisa';

SELECT
  p.patient_id,
  CONCAT(p.patient_id, 
         LENGTH(p.last_name), 
         EXTRACT(YEAR from p.birth_date)) AS temp_password
FROM patients p
JOIN admissions a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id;

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN MOD(p.patient_id, 2) = 0 THEN 'Yes'      ELSE 'No'    END AS has_insurance,
  SUM(
    CASE 
      WHEN MOD(p.patient_id, 2) = 0 THEN 10        ELSE 50      END
  ) AS admission_total
FROM patients p
JOIN admissions a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id
GROUP BY has_insurance;

SELECT province_name
FROM patients
GROUP BY province_name
HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN gender = 'M' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > SUM(CASE WHEN gender = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END);

SELECT *
FROM patients
WHERE 
  first_name LIKE '__r%'  -- First name contains 'r' after the first two letters
  AND gender = 'F'        -- Gender is 'F'
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM birth_date) IN (2, 5, 12)  -- Born in February, May, or December
  AND weight BETWEEN 60 AND 80  -- Weight between 60kg and 80kg
  AND MOD(patient_id, 2) = 1  -- Patient ID is an odd number
  AND city = 'Kingston';  -- City is 'Kingston'

SELECT
  admission_date,
  COUNT(*) AS total_admissions,
  COUNT(*) - LAG(COUNT(*), 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY admission_date) AS admissions_change
FROM admissions
GROUP BY admission_date
ORDER BY admission_date;

SELECT province_name
FROM province_names
ORDER BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN province_name = 'Ontario' THEN 0
    ELSE 1
  END,
  province_name ASC;

SELECT
  d.doctor_id,
  CONCAT(d.first_name, ' ', d.last_name) AS doctor_full_name,
  d.specialty,
  EXTRACT year(a.admission_date) AS year,
  COUNT(*) AS total_admissions
FROM admissions a
JOIN doctors d ON a.attending_doctor_id = d.doctor_id
GROUP BY d.doctor_id, doctor_full_name, d.specialty, year
ORDER BY d.doctor_id, year;

editorText:
SELECT
  d.doctor_id,
  CONCAT(d.first_name, ' ', d.last_name) AS doctor_full_name,
  d.specialty,
  EXTRACT year(a.admission_date) AS year,
  COUNT(*) AS total_admissions
FROM admissions a
JOIN doctors d ON a.attending_doctor_id = d.doctor_id
GROUP BY d.doctor_id, doctor_full_name, d.specialty, year
ORDER BY d.doctor_id, year;
